subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A few clutch par putts save the veteran’s third round — he shot a 70 — and Louis Oosthuizen climbed into second place at the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational.
snippet: A few clutch par putts save the veteran’s third round — he shot a 70 — and Louis Oosthuizen climbed into second place at the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational.
